unnormalised: Okay, so return policies, right? I once bought a saree from Chandni Chowk online. Material was totally different! Thank God for easy returns. My cousin, Priya, had a similar experience with shoes for Diwali. Returns need to be simple, like enjoying a plate of hot biryani on a rainy day in Mumbai. Warna, no sale, boss! Especially during Onam offers! Bad experience is bad PR, for sure.
normalised: Okay, so return policies, right? I once bought a saree from Chandni Chowk online. Material was totally different! Thank God for easy returns. My cousin, Priya, had a similar experience with shoes for Diwali. Returns need to be simple, like enjoying a plate of hot biryani on a rainy day in Mumbai. Otherwise, no sale, boss! Especially during Onam offers! Bad experience is bad P R, for sure.
